        components - An ArrayList containing the Name of the Coursework Components.
        componentMarks - An ArrayList containing the Grades of the Coursework Components.

        public void printCourseStatistics(int totalNoOfStudents,
                         double examMarks,
                         java.lang.Double[] componentMarks,
                         java.lang.String[] componentNames)
        Prints the Statistics of the Course.
        Parameters:
        totalNoOfStudents - An Integer containing the total number of students.
        examMarks - A Double containing the average Exam Marks.
        componentMarks - An ArrayList containing the average Component Marks.
        componentNames - An ArrayList containing the Component Names.
